data.name: SEASON PASS: Additional Episodes: 12-Episode Set
data.detailed_description:
A season pass that allows you to obtain 12 additional episodes for "Attack on Titan 2" at a discounted price.

▼Season pass content
- 12 new episodes are added to the Daily Life section in "Story Mode", and to the "Scout Missions" in "Another Mode".

▼You can play the new episodes by performing either of the following:
1. Select "Another Mode" on the main menu, and then talk with a Scout.
Select a new episode from the list of "Scout Missions".
2. Select "Story Mode" on the main menu, and then talk with a Scout in the Daily Life section.
Select a new episode from the list of "Scout Missions".

▼You can play the new episodes by performing either of the following:

Select a new episode from the list of "Scout Missions".
2. Select "Story Mode" on the main menu, and then talk with a Scout in the Daily Life section.

data.short_description: A season pass that allows you to obtain 12 additional episodes for "Attack on Titan 2" at a discounted price.

fullgame.name: Attack on Titan 2 - A.O.T.2 - 進撃の巨人２

data.supported_languages:
English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Korean, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 7/8.1/10 64bit
  • Processor: Core I5 2400 or over
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 VRAM 1GB or over
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16bit Stereo 48kHzWAVE
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win 7/8.1/10 64bit
  • Processor: Core i7 3770 or over
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 VRAM 2GB or over
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16bit 5.1ch surround 48KHzWAVE
